timeline.august2018: Graduated as a Biosystems Engineer, University of São Paulo
timeline.april2020: Completed the Women Can Code program, transitioning to technology
timeline.june2020: Hired by Venturus as Junior Frontend Developer
timeline.march2022: Started a Specialization in Software Engineering
timeline.may2022: New professional experience as a Web Developer at Farfetch (remote position - Portugal)
timeline.june2022: Developed an internal application using JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, and CSS
timeline.october2023_1: Completed the Postgraduate Specialization in Software Engineering
timeline.october2023_2: Responsible for scaling the web application using React, SCSS, and Firebase
timeline.march2024: Started mentoring a new team member

list.title: Web Development at Farfetch
list.description: Planning and development of a web application to replace an internal spreadsheet-based process
list.responsibilities: Initially, the application was developed using Vanilla JavaScript. With the need for scaling, a new application was built with React and SCSS.
list.stack: JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, CSS, React, SCSS, Firebase

list.title: Frontend Development at Venturus
list.description: Participation in two projects, the first with a Scrum-based team and later in a SAFe framework.
list.responsibilities: Development and maintenance of frontend applications using React, Redux, and TypeScript. Integration with REST APIs, testing with Jest and Cypress, and code delivery based on code reviews.
list.stack: React, Redux, TypeScript, REST APIs, Jest, Cypress

list.title: Financial API
list.description: A personal project published on RapidAPI that fetches real-time data for stocks and cryptocurrencies.
list.responsibilities: My first experience with Python, focused on learning the language and implementing an API.

list.title: BuddyMinder
list.description: Development of a Chrome extension to assist with memorizing important information.
list.responsibilities: Implementation of a plugin based on a personal idea to improve memory retention and learning with minimal user effort through notifications.
list.stack: React, SCSS, Ant Design, i18n, Firebase,  Chrome Extension APIs

legend.favorites: My absolute favorites and main area of expertise
legend.comfortable: I feel comfortable, but need occasional brushing up
legend.improving: I’ve worked with these but still improving
legend.learning: On my way! Just starting out
